channel.title: Adding Max
channel.description:
So i wanted to add the npc max what you get the max cape off so i was wonderig how would i make him walk to ramdom places and if he is like at aCertain cord near an anvill he does and animation
My questions
Would this be hard Is There a tutorial somewhere and if not how would i start doin it

item.title: Adding Max
item.dc:creator: @aciraccar aciraccar
item.description:
@aciraccar wrote:

there wouldnt be any point since RSPS are based on teleports instead of walking so finding him would be harder then soloing Corp -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Max
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

TheTutMan:

ok so on runescape there is an npc called Max who is like a normal player and he moves around certent areas and does woodcuting and smithng and skills how would i make it so the npc what i made moves around and if at certent cords he does an animation

I think he knows that, he was getting at your grammar and spelling.

Read full topic
